tickets.subject: RE: Mariana
tickets.description:
Hi Corie,

 

I checked her forward address in our system and it’s displayed correctly as you show below.  So I am still not sure what you are referring to.  I’m tagging the helpdesk so they may possibly assist you and remote in and see what you are seeing.  Everywhere I see her address is correct in our system and her personal domain address does not show anywhere other than as a forward but I checked and that is spelled correctly as well.

 

Regards,

Kevin

--------------------------------

Kevin Keenan | Alain Pinel Realtors®

Senior Systems Administrator III | Corporate Office

12772 Saratoga Sunnyvale Rd, Ste 1000 | Saratoga, CA 95070

Email: kkeenan@apr.com

 

From: Corie Thompson
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2018 10:50 AM
To: Kevin Keenan <kkeenan@apr.com>
Subject: RE: Mariana

 

OH, sorry… yes her name seems correct on her APR email. It’s her mariana@marianapappalardo.com address in our email system that is wrong. Can I change that?

Or do you have to?

Thanks,

Corie

 

From: Kevin Keenan
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2018 10:31 AM
To: Corie Thompson
Subject: Mariana

 

When I look in SAVI I see the below screenshots.  Her name looks correct there no?

 

 

 

Regards,

Kevin

--------------------------------

Kevin Keenan | Alain Pinel Realtors®

Senior Systems Administrator III | Corporate Office

12772 Saratoga Sunnyvale Rd, Ste 1000 | Saratoga, CA 95070

Email: kkeenan@apr.com

Thank you!

 

Mayela Saldana

OFFICE ADMINISTRATOR

ALAIN PINEL REALTORS®

Montclair | Alameda

D 510.899.8002

Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2018 3:22 PM
To: Mayela Saldana
Subject: FW: Adwerx Marketing Materials - Now Available!

I had these delivered to the office on Friday.

 

Should I put them on the floor for the Agents to include in there APR CMA marketing books?

 

Sincerely,

 

BROOKE DAWSON

Alain Pinel Realtors®

2212-B South Shore Center W

Alameda, Ca 94501

tickets.subject: Regarding email kick back for M Pappalardo
tickets.raw_subject: Regarding email kick back for M Pappalardo
tickets.description:
This is a follow-up to your previous request #69569 "Chat with Corie Thompson"

HI!
I was asked to send a copy of the kick back email that we've been getting for Mariana Pappalardo.
Note in this section below   "This is a delivery failure notification message indicating that an email you addressed to email address :
-- mariana@marianapapplardo.com"  her last name is missing an "a". 

Thanks! 
Corie

-----Original Message-----
From: Receptionist 1 MP 
Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2018 3:39 PM
To: Corie Thompson
Subject: FW: [Postmaster] Email Delivery Failure



-----Original Message-----
From: MISSUPPORT [mailto:missupport@apr.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 28, 2018 10:57 AM
To: Receptionist 1 MP
Subject: [Postmaster] Email Delivery Failure

This is a delivery failure notification message indicating that an email you addressed to email address :
-- mariana@marianapapplardo.com

could not be delivered. The problem appears to be :
-- Recipient email address is possibly incorrect

Additional information follows :
-- Domain has no MX records or is invalid

This condition occurred after 30 attempt(s) to deliver over a period of 92 hour(s).

If you sent the email to multiple recipients, you will receive one of these messages for each one which failed delivery,  otherwise they have been sent.

tickets.subject: Reordering on Xpressdocs
tickets.description:
Hi All, late yesterday I was trying to reorder brochures on Xpressdocs.  As I have done for years, I opened the program, went to “Order History”, found my 2560 Carisbrook fold over with intention of changing the price and buying a new set.  However, instead of the “shopping cart” icon needed for reorder, which was still there for some of my other recent orders, there is an X.  I wrote to their Support line and this morning received the email I am forwarding.  I managed to do this process, but it is not intuitive, instead it is very obscure.  I’m writing to all because others may experience the wasted time and frustration I experienced.  There is no easy way to find these instructions in the Academy.  Probably there somewhere.

 

Best regards,

 

Helen

 

Helen Nicholas, CRS

REALTOR®, Broker Associate

Alain Pinel REALTORS®

6211 LaSalle Avenue Oakland, CA 94611

Cell: (510)504-7986 DRE# 00526434

 

  

I have not and will not verify or investigate information supplied by third parties.

 

From: Reggie Judge [mailto:rjudge@xpressdocs.com]
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2018 5:53 AM
To: Helen Nicholas <hnicholas@apr.com>
Subject: Reorder 4668265

 

Good morning,

 

Thank you for contacting Xpressdocs!  I am happy to assist you with accessing your reorder.

 

The reorder process has changed with Alain Pinel, you will locate that same template. Once you have gotten to the customization screen, there will be a drop down menu allowing you to retrieve order data from a previous order (Please see attached screenshot).

 

If you have any additional questions or concerns, please respond directly to this email and I will personally respond, or you can contact our Client Services Department by phone at 866-977-3627 or via Live Chat from your account landing page.  Our Client Services department’s hours of operation are 8 a.m. and 7 p.m., Monday through Friday, Central Standard Time.

Have a great day!

 

 

Reginald Judge

CLIENT SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE

 

o: 866.977.3627 | f: 817.870.1205 | xpressdocs.com

4901 North Beach Street, Fort Worth, TX 76137
